name: Friday Night Funkin' x Amogus | FNF Mod | HTML 5 Online Port
name_original: Friday Night Funkin' x Amogus | FNF Mod | HTML 5 Online Port
description:
All I have for you is a word: Amogus. Use it carefully. It'll open the right doors, but some of the wrong ones, too.

The downloadable version of the mod, on which this port is based, is available here. All the credit goes to JoeSeff.

>> Click here to play more FNF mods <<
